thread.title: Retired police chief takes over BTV Ignite
thread.title_full: Retired police chief takes over BTV Ignite - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Retired police chief takes over BTV Ignite
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - Mike Schirling retired as Burlington's chief of police June 30. But he didn't have to wait long, or travel far, to find his new job.
Last week, Schirling was hired as the full-time executive director of BTV Ignite. The goal of Ignite is to get more out of Burlington's broadband infrastructure, helping to boost education, the economy and the community, but Ignite has failed to take off so far.
Watch the video for more information.
